entry.tran: 西洋十五子棋；西洋双陆棋
entry.def: Backgammon is a game for two people, played on a board marked with long triangles. Each player has 15 wooden or plastic discs. The players throw dice and move the discs around the board.

means.word_mean: 1. a board game for two players; pieces move according to throws of the dice
